body.p:
Georgetown, Ky Aug 19th '61
To His Excellency B. Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky
And Commander in Chief of the State Guard
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir
I respectfully beg leave to tender my resignation of the position of Inspector of the State Guard for Scott Co and ask your acceptance thereof

Your Ob'dt Sv't
Ben F. Bradley
Ben. F. Bradley
Inspector
Scott Co.
Recd Aug 28. 1861
